cards.name: Bury
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Put any card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Avoid
cards.description:
+1 Buy
The next time you shuffle this turn, pick up to 3 of those cards to put into your discard pile.

cards.name: Deliver
cards.description:
+1 Buy
This turn, each time you gain a card, set it aside, and put it into your hand at end of turn.

cards.name: Peril
cards.description: You may trash an Action card from your hand to gain a Loot.

cards.name: Rush
cards.description:
+1 Buy
The next time you gain an Action card this turn, play it.

cards.name: Foray
cards.description: Discard 3 cards, revealing them. If they have 3 different names, gain a Loot.

cards.name: Launch
cards.description: Once per turn: Return to your Action phase. +1 Card, +1 Action, and +1 Buy.

cards.name: Mirror
cards.description:
+1 Buy
The next time you gain an Action card this turn, gain a copy of it.

cards.name: Prepare
cards.description:
Set aside your hand face up.
At the start of your next turn, play those Actions and Treasures in any order, then discard the rest.

cards.name: Scrounge
cards.description: Choose one: Trash a card from your hand; or gain an Estate from the trash, and if you did, gain a card costing up to $5.

cards.name: Journey
cards.description: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, you don't discard cards from play in Clean-up this turn, and take an extra turn after this one.

cards.name: Maelstrom
cards.description: Trash 3 cards from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand trashes one of them.

cards.name: Looting
cards.description: Gain a Loot.

cards.name: Invasion
cards.description: You may play an Attack from your hand. Gain a Duchy. Gain an Action onto your deck. Gain a Loot; play it.

cards.name: Prosper
cards.description: Gain a Loot, plus any number of differently named Treasures.

cards.name: Cage
cards.description:
Set aside up to 4 cards from your hand face down (on this).
The next time you gain a Victory card, trash this, and put the set aside cards into your hand at end of turn.

cards.name: Grotto
cards.description:
+1 Action
Set aside up to 4 cards from your hand face down (on this). At the start of your next turn, discard them, then draw as many.

cards.name: Jewelled Egg
cards.description:
Worth $1
+1 Buy
----------
When you trash this, gain a Loot.

cards.name: Search
cards.description:
+$2
The next time a Supply pile empties, trash this and gain a Loot.

cards.name: Shaman
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$1
You may trash a card from your hand.
----------
In games using this, at the start of your turn, gain a card from the trash costing up to $6.

cards.name: Secluded Shrine
cards.description:
+$1
The next time you gain a Treasure, trash up to 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Siren
cards.description:
Each other player gains a Curse. At the start of your next turn, draw until you have 8 cards in hand.
----------
When you gain this, trash it unless you trash an Action from your hand.

cards.name: Stowaway
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards
----------
When anyone gains a Duration card, you may play this from your hand.

cards.name: Taskmaster
cards.description: +1 Action, +$1, and if you gain a card costing exactly $5 this turn, then at the start of your next turn repeat this ability.

cards.name: Abundance
cards.description: The next time you gain an Action card: +1 Buy and +$3

cards.name: Cabin Boy
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, choose one: +$2; or trash this to gain a Duration card.

cards.name: Crucible
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per $1 it costs.

cards.name: Flagship
cards.description:
+$2
The next time you play a non-Command Action card, replay it.

cards.name: Fortune Hunter
cards.description:
+$2
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play a Treasure from them. Put the rest back in any order.

cards.name: Gondola
cards.description:
Either now or at the start of your next turn: +$2.
----------
When you gain this, you may play an Action card from your hand.

cards.name: Harbor Village
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
After the next Action you play this turn, if it gave you +$, +$1.

cards.name: Landing Party
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
The next time the first card you play on a turn is a Treasure, put this onto your deck afterwards.

cards.name: Mapmaker
cards.description:
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand and discard the rest.
----------
When any player gains a Victory card, you may play this from your hand.

cards.name: Maroon
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand, +2 Cards per type it has (Action, Attack, etc.).

cards.name: Rope
cards.description:
Worth $1
+1 Buy
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card and you may trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Swamp Shacks
cards.description:
+2 Actions
+1 Card per 3 cards you have in play (rounded down).

cards.name: Tools
cards.description: Gain a copy of a card anyone has in play.

cards.name: Buried Treasure
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, +1 Buy and +$3.
----------
When you gain this, play it.

cards.name: Crew
cards.description:
+3 Cards
At the start of your next turn, put this onto your deck.

cards.name: Cutthroat
cards.description:
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
The next time anyone gains a Treasure costing $5 or more, gain a Loot.

cards.name: Enlarge
cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn: Trash a card from your hand, and gain one costing up to $2 more.

cards.name: Figurine
cards.description:
+2 Cards
You may discard an Action card for +1 Buy and +$1.

cards.name: First Mate
cards.description: Play any number of Action cards with the same name from your hand, then draw until you have 6 cards in hand.

cards.name: Frigate
cards.description:
+$3
Until the start of your next turn, each time another player plays an Action card, they discard down to 4 cards in hand afterwards.

cards.name: Longship
cards.description:
+2 Actions
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Mining Road
cards.description:
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$2
Once this turn, when you gain a Treasure, you may play it.

cards.name: Pendant
cards.description: +$1 per differently named Treasure you have in play.

cards.name: Pickaxe
cards.description:
Worth $1
Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $3 or more, gain a Loot to your hand.

cards.name: Pilgrim
cards.description:
+4 Cards
Put a card from your hand onto your deck.

cards.name: Quartermaster
cards.description: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game, choose one: Gain a card costing up to $4, setting it aside on this; or put a card from this into your hand.

cards.name: Silver Mine
cards.description: Gain a treasure costing less than this to your hand.

cards.name: Trickster
cards.description:
Each other player gains a Curse.
Once this turn, when you discard a Treasure from play, you may set it aside. Put it in your hand at end of turn.

cards.name: Wealthy Village
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
----------
When you gain this, if you have at least 3 differently named Treasures in play, gain a Loot.

cards.name: Sack of Loot
cards.description:
Worth $1
+1 Buy
Gain a Loot.

cards.name: King's Cache
cards.description: You may play a Treasure from your hand 3 times.

cards.name: Amphora
cards.description: Either now or at the start of your next turn: +1 Buy and +$3.

cards.name: Doubloons
cards.description:
Worth $3
----------
When you gain this, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Endless Chalice
cards.description:
Now and at the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:
Worth $1
+1 Buy

cards.name: Figurehead
cards.description:
Worth $3
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Hammer
cards.description:
Worth $3
Gain a card costing up to $4.

cards.name: Insignia
cards.description:
Worth $3
This turn, when you gain a card, you may put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Jewels
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
At the start of your next turn, put this on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Orb
cards.description: Look through your discard pile, Choose one: Play an Action or Treasure from it; or +1 Buy and +$3.

cards.name: Prize Goat
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
You may trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Puzzle Box
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
You may set aside a card from your hand face down. Put it into your hand at end of turn.

cards.name: Sextant
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard any number. Put the rest back in any order.

cards.name: Shield
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
----------
When another player plays an Attack, you may first reveal this from your hand to be unaffected.

cards.name: Spell Scroll
cards.description: Trash this to gain a cheaper card. If it's an action or Treasure, you may play it.

cards.name: Staff
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
You may play an Action from your hand.

cards.name: Sword
cards.description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.

cards.name: Cheap
cards.description: Cheap cards cost $1 less.

cards.name: Cursed
cards.description: When you gain a Cursed card, gain a Loot and a Curse.

cards.name: Fated
cards.description: When shuffling, you may look through the cards and reveal Fated cards to put them on top or bottom.

cards.name: Fawning
cards.description: When you gain a Province, gain a Fawning card.

cards.name: Friendly
cards.description: At the start of your Clean-up phase, you may discard a Friendly card to gain a Friendly card.

cards.name: Hasty
cards.description: When you gain a Hasty card, set it aside, and play it at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Inherited
cards.description: Setup: You start the game with an Inherited card in place of a starting card you choose.

cards.name: Inspiring
cards.description: After playing an Inspiring card on your turn, you may play an Action from your hand that you don't have a card of in play.

cards.name: Nearby
cards.description: When you gain a Nearby card, +1 Buy.

cards.name: Patient
cards.description: At the start of your Clean-up phase, you may set aside Patient cards from your hand to play them at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Pious
cards.description: When you gain a Pious card, you may trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Reckless
cards.description: Follow the instructions of played Reckless cards twice. When discarding one from play, return it to its pile.

cards.name: Rich
cards.description: When you gain a Rich card, gain a Silver.

cards.name: Shy
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may discard one Shy card for +2 Cards.

cards.name: Tireless
cards.description: When you discard a Tireless card from play, set it aside, and put it onto your deck at end of turn.
